meanings.definition: A habitational surname for someone who lived in a town called Mandel.
meanings.english_definition: A habitational surname for someone who lived in a town called Mandel.

meanings.definition: George Mandler (1924–2016), an Austrian-born American cognitive psychologist.
meanings.english_definition: George Mandler (1924–2016), an Austrian-born American cognitive psychologist.

etymology.value: From German, likely a habitational surname.
